item.title: Tesla shareholders share mixed reactions to latest sales pitch
item.description: Tesla made a trillion-dollar pitch to its shareholders on Sept. 29.

item.title: Amazon is selling Skechers walking shoes for $45 right now
item.description: The cooling insole and large color variety make them a popular pick for shoppers.

item.title: Another regional airline files for bankruptcy, cancels all flights
item.description: "I understand that those affected are saddened, shocked, and disappointed," the board chairman said in a statement.

item.description: "I bought this in 2021 and it still works perfectly."
